summary: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.
cast: Helmut Berger|Richard Todd|Herbert Lom|Marie Liljedahl|Margaret Lee|Maria Rohm|Beryl Cunningham|Isa Miranda|Eleonora Rossi Drago|Renato Romano|Stewart Black|Peter Evans|Iris Fry|Juba Kennerley|Renzo Marignano|Dido Plumb|John Tatham|Francesco Tensi
title: El retrato de Dorian Gray
